containers.name: pages-test-pass
args: while true; do (mysql -u root -h pages-mysql pages -ppassword  -e 'show tables;' > logs.txt);count=$(cat logs.txt | grep '[p]ages' | wc -l);if [[ $count -gt 0 ]]; then echo 'Found'; exit 0;else echo 'Not Found';exit 1;fi;done
